name: Loopbot (Kreyk29)
description:
Loopbot is a puzzle game about a bot that repeats every command in the loop! In this version (v.6 alpha) game has: -28 levels with different difficulty (extra levels are harder); -7 different things (rob, wall, flag...); and -level editor!!! How to use level editor: LMB - place the thing. LMB (nothing used) - remove the thing. Mouse wheel - change the thing. RMB on the thing - rotate it. S - save the level. L - load the level. -To add slots for loop, click on the number button next to them.

You cant play levels right now but when you will send them to me, maybe I will add them to the game!
